name: Breeding Pool
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {G} or {U}.)
As Breeding Pool enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: Where Jin-Gitaxias's ingenuity meets Vorniclex's inhumanity.

name: Sacred Foundry
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {R} or {W}.)
As Sacred Foundry enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

name: Steam Vents
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {U} or {R}.)
As Steam Vents enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: Despite being abandoned for millennia, the Thran ironworks occasionally sputter to life.

name: Overgrown Tomb
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {B} or {G}.)
As Overgrown Tomb enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
"Brago's tomb was first erected as a formality. Now it stands as the last memorial to a forgotten fool."
—Queen Marchesa

name: Godless Shrine
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {W} or {B}.)
As Godless Shrine enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: The Second Sun brought nothing but darkness.

name: Temple Garden
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)
As Temple Garden enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: Karametra's worshippers know that one must plant countless seeds to ensure a bountiful harvest.

name: Stomping Ground
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)
As Stomping Ground enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
"Atarka and her subjects congregate in Ayagor, the Dragon's Bowl. Its my duty to keep that bowl full."
—Surrak, the Hunt Caller

name: Blood Crypt
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)
As Blood Crypt enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: Vampires invited to a soiree at Markov Manner are expected to bring a guest or refreshments—or both.

name: Watery Grave
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)
As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
"Aye, ships go missing in the Stormwreck Sea all the time. That's why we don't call it the Calmsafe Current."
—Captian Lannery Storm

name: Hallowed Fountain
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)
As Hallowed Fountain enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: Two statues stand watch over the entrance to Valor's Reach, celebrating its twin founders—and its first champions.

name: Breena, the Demagogue
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever a player attacks one of your opponents, if that opponent has more life than another of your opponents, that attacking player draws a card and you put two +1/+1 counters on a creature you control.

name: Zaffai, Thunder Conductor
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, scry 1. If that spell's mana value is 5 or greater, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token. If that spell's mana value is 10 or greater, Zaffai, Thunder Conductor deals 10 damage to an opponent chosen at random.

name: Osgir, the Reconstructor
oracle_text:
Vigilance
{1}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{X}, {T}, Exile an artifact card with mana value X from your graveyard: Create two tokens that are copies of the exiled card. Activate only as a sorcery.

name: Willowdusk, Essence Seer
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Choose another target creature. Put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the amount of life you gained this turn or the amount of life you lost this turn, whichever is greater. Activate only as a sorcery.

name: Adrix and Nev, Twincasters
oracle_text:
Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
If one or more tokens would be created under your control, twice that many of those tokens are created instead.

name: All Is Dust
oracle_text: Each player sacrifices all permanents they control that are one or more colors.

name: Fractured Identity
oracle_text: Exile target nonland permanent. Each player other than its controller creates a token that's a copy of it.

name: Fire Covenant
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life.
Fire Covenant deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

name: Drown in the Loch
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Counter target spell with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in its controller's graveyard.
• Destroy target creature with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in its controller's graveyard.

name: Fracturing Gust
oracle_text: Destroy all artifacts and enchantments. You gain 2 life for each permanent destroyed this way.

name: Artifact Mutation
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated. Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is that artifact's mana value.

name: Gamble
oracle_text: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, discard a card at random, then shuffle.

name: Wrath of God
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

name: Preordain
oracle_text: Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Decree of Pain
oracle_text:
Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way.
Cycling {3}{B}{B} ({3}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Decree of Pain, all creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

name: Nature's Lore
oracle_text: Search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: "Greetings, tired traveler."

name: Ambition's Cost
oracle_text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
flavor_text:
"Conquering your first world is the hardest, after all. My power grew as I moved from world to world, taking anything that would make the next taking easier."
—Ob Nixilis

name: Ancient Craving
oracle_text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
flavor_text: Knowledge demands sacrifice.

name: Deadly Tempest
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. Each player loses life equal to the number of creatures they controlled that were destroyed this way.
flavor_text: When the winds blow out of the abyss, death is the only harvest.

name: Damnable Pact
oracle_text: Target player draws X cards and loses X life.
flavor_text:
"Silumgar's mind is a dark labyrinth, full of grim secrets and subtle traps."
—Siara, the Dragon's Mouth

name: Bloodtracker
oracle_text:
Flying
{B}, Pay 2 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodtracker.
When Bloodtracker leaves the battlefield, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: "Flee all you like. The further you run the more firmly I feel your heartbeat."

name: Bloodthirsty Aerialist
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodthirsty Aerialist.
flavor_text: A circus acrobat in life, she kills with such fluid grace that even her victims are awed by her performance.

name: Greed
oracle_text: {B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.
flavor_text: What is a sliver of one's soul compared to unimaginable wealth?

name: Feed the Swarm
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's converted mana cost.
flavor_text:
"On vile wings and bloody wind, the swarm will rise."
—Skyclave inscription

name: Epicure of Blood
oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.
flavor_text: "Fleshy, with just a hint of leather. A fine vintage."

name: Defiant Bloodlord
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.
flavor_text:
"Despite their bravado, mortals are fragile. If Zendikar is to endure, its lords must save it."
—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief

name: Ob Nixilis Reignited
oracle_text:
+1: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
−3: Destroy target creature.
−8: Target opponent gets an emblem with "Whenever a player draws a card, you lose 2 life."

name: Noxious Gearhulk
oracle_text:
Menace
When Noxious Gearhulk enters the battlefield, you may destroy another target creature. If a creature is destroyed this way, you gain life equal to its toughness.

name: Sanguine Bond
oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.
flavor_text:
"Blood is constant. Every drop I drink, someone must bleed."
—Vradeen, vampire nocturnus

name: Sangromancer
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may gain 3 life.
Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may gain 3 life.

name: Reckless Spite
oracle_text: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.
flavor_text: "The end is justified in being mean. Or something like that."

name: Vampire Nighthawk
oracle_text: Flying, deathtouch, lifelink
flavor_text: As they fought the Eldrazi, many vampires learned to live among humans. Others were unable to make the adjustment.

name: Taste of Death
oracle_text: Each player sacrifices three creatures. You create three Food tokens. (They're artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
flavor_text:
"Hone the knife and mourn the least. Three chimes to sound the sweet, grim feast."
—Barrow witch incantation

name: Suffer the Past
oracle_text: Exile X target cards from target player's graveyard. For each card exiled this way, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Ulamog's tentacles, their touch like burning ice, rummaged through his soul and stung his memories one by one.

name: Silversmote Ghoul
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, return Silversmote Ghoul from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice Silversmote Ghoul: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Being trapped between two forms of unlife is a fate worse than mere death.
